articles.description: During Sony’s 2021 Technology Day presentation, we got to get a look at what goes on in the tech giant’s labs and see what it’s working on outside of PlayStations and Spider-Verse sequels.
articles.content:
Getting a look at some of the things Sonys working on
Image: Sony
Sonys holding its Technology Day event to show off what its been working on in its R&D labs, and this year, we got some great v… [+3893 chars]
